Dribbbles

DRIBBBLE

Social dog walking app

An app concept for tracking your dog's walks, with collar geo location to measure your dog's covered distance and proximity to you. This is a continuation of the concept from Daily UI 19, a leader board UI design that 'Gamifies' dog walking to keep dog owners engaged and incentivised to walk their dogs. 🐶 @Daily UI
DRIBBBLE

ECommerce dashboard

An eCommerce analytics UI design for @Daily UI 18. Having experience running an eCommerce store, I took this opportunity to design my ideal analytics page. I used horizontal and vertical grids to try and fit in as much information as I could whilst still letting it breath. 🙂
DRIBBBLE

Social app settings page

Daily UI #007 - design a settings page!
DRIBBBLE

Home monitoring app dashboard

An app concept for a home monitoring app's dashboard. I tried to balance visual appeal with usability by presenting information in a clean and minimal as design whilst adding some visual flare to the most important element on the screen. ❄️🔥 @Daily UI

About Me

Hi, my name is Ashley Saleem-West. I'm a web developer based St Albans, a wonderful town near London in the UK. I describe myself as a passionately user-focused developer who loves coding, design, and the web platform.

Starting as a designer and becoming acquainted with web development through personal E-Commerce projects before moving onto E-Service Europe Ltd, to redesign and develop their E-Commerce website.

With experiece in MySQL databases and React.JS, I am always pushing myself to learn more and have been making use of the time saved from commuting by participating in Harvard's CS50 course for Web Programming.

I think of performance and design as two sides of the same coin, which is why I push for great user experience without a heavy overhead. I like to ask myself how I can make an application easy, enjoyable,and fast to use.

When I'm not coding or designing, I can be found drawing or caring for my two adorable clownfish.
